answerText: Karel Capek [10] Identify Capek's most famous work, which coined the term 'robot' and which ends with Helena and a Robot falling in love after the destruction of the human race.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of North Carolina, Truman State A, and University of Toronto | 20 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Some of this writer's works include Adam the Creator and Power and Glory.   [10] Name this writer, who penned such works as War with the Newts and The White Disease.
